name: magento-glossary
description: A single page application for Magento Glossary

scripts.copy: echo '=> copying files' && copyfiles index.html js/*.min.js js/templates/* data/* css/* fonts/* _site/
scripts.minify: echo '=>minifying files' && uglifyjs -c -o js/glossary.min.js js/glossary.js js/glossary.page.js js/glossary.page.filter.js js/glossary.page.renderer.js
scripts.convert: echo '=>converting excel file to xml' && python scripts/xml-export.py -i scripts/example.xlsx -o data/test.xml
